mapper.select: select a.std_no, b.dept_nm, a.std_nm, a.std_telno, a.std_zip, a.std_addr, a.std_daddr, a.std_mail, a.std_brdt, a.std_profile_path from student a, department b where a.dept_cd = b.dept_cd
mapper.update: update student set std_no = #{stdNo}, std_telno = #{stdTelno}, std_zip = #{stdZip}, std_addr = #{stdAddr}, std_daddr = #{stdDaddr}, std_mail = #{stdMail}, std_profile_path = null
